attributes.action: Assist Turkey in fighting the fires
attributes.additional_details: During the pandemic Turkey helped supply PPE to this country, it's now our turn to assist them, with the devastating forest fires all over there country
attributes.background: supply as much assistance as we can to assist Turkey fight all the forest fire

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Help Turkey with the wildfires
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593834
